name: Posedge
tag_list: wireless-connectivity, wired-connectivity, switching, routing, silicon-ip, 802-11-n, 802-11-ac, sdsdioemmc, ipsec, macsec, ethernet-switch, crdma, aes, rf-module, onfi, flash-controller
overview:
Posedge Inc. is a leading global provider of Communication, Networking, Memory and I/O Sub-System Intellectual Property Solutions. Posedge delivers true Quality and Time to Market advantages by providing customers with a total solution of IP, Software and Development platforms along with world-class support. At Posedge we deliver reliable, resilient and scalable wireless products with advanced network management and comprehensive security features.

Posedge specializes in WLAN products for the following environments and applications:

  • Enterprise and Corporate Wireless LAN
  • Wireless home and SOHO
  • Public Wireless LAN, and Hotspot services
  • Embedded wireless modules for Desktop/notebook, PDA, Digital Camera and Cell phones -Mobile Infrastructure -Small cell / Wireless Backhaul IP Solutions
